seg.source: In der syrischen Stadt Aleppo sind nach staatlichen Angaben mehrere große Sprengsätze detoniert, offenbar vor zwei Einrichtungen der Sicherheitskräfte.
seg.translation: In the Syrian city of Aleppo after government data several large bombs are detonated, apparently, two institutions of the security forces.
In Aleppo, Syria, Syrian several large explosive devices are detonates according to State, apparently before two installations of the security forces.
In the Syrian city Aleppo detonated according to national instructions several large explosive devices, obviously before two mechanisms of the security forces.

seg.source: Die Nachrichtenagentur Sana meldet, die Terroranschläge hätten einem Gebäude des Militärgeheimdienstes und dem Sitz der Ordnungspolizei gegolten.
seg.translation: The news agency Sana reported that terrorist attacks would have been considered a building of military intelligence and the seat of the Order Police.
The news agency Sana reports the terrorist attacks would have applied a building of military intelligence, and the seat of the Ordnungspolizei.
The press agency Sana announces, the terrorist attacks would have been valid a building of the military secret service and the seat of the order police.

seg.source: Nach Angaben des Staatsfernsehens kamen 25 Menschen ums Leben, demnach gibt es 175 Verletzte.
seg.translation: According to state television 25 people died and therefore there are 175 injured.
According to data of State television, 25 people came, therefore, there are 175 injured.
To data of public television 25 humans died, therefore give it to 175 injured.

seg.source: Unter den Opfern sollen Zivilpersonen und Militärangehörige sein.
seg.translation: Among the victims are to be civilians and military personnel.
Civilians and military personnel should be among the victims.
Among the victims civilians and military member are to be.
